script.description: Converts multiple dtbooks to epub3 format

input.desc: One or more DTBook files to be transformed. In the case of multiple files, a merge will be performed.
input.name: source

option.desc: Whether to stop processing and raise an error on validation issues.
option.name: assert-valid

option.desc: Directory where both temp-files and the resulting EPUB3 publication is stored.
option.name: output-dir

option.desc: Language code of the input document.
option.name: language
